version_description:
Thank you for all the feedback! 

v1.1:
- Now get Free coins on watching videos! 
- Ads get disabled if you buy No-Ads
- Unlock Flares at Level 8 instead of Level 10

Coming up soon in v1.2:
- 2 New Planes!

Thank you for all the feedback! 

v1.1:
- Now get Free coins on watching videos! 
- Ads get disabled if you buy No-Ads
- Unlock Flares at Level 8 instead of Level 10

Coming up soon in v1.2:
- 2 New Planes!

This a minor update with some fixes while we prepare for a major update, coming soon in October! 

v4.9:
- Fixed UI in Game Over screen where unlocked planes were not notified to the player
- Fixed bug where last 3 planes were not being unlocked immediately on game over
- Fixed minor UI when player purchases VIP Subscription
- Other minor updates in preparation for a major update (v5.0) releasing October 3rd!

Thank you for playing Man Vs. Missiles! If you wish to share any feedback or any new features which you would like to see, please let us know! Write to us at info@spiel-s.com.

Spiel Team

v4.6 (Major Update & Fixes):
- Introducing new game mode - DUELS. Now play head-to-head realtime with an online opponent using any random Plane in the game!
- 5 New Planes added specifically themed for - USA, China, India, Japan & Russian players
- 1 New VIP Plane added
- Improved localization for Japanese & Korean languages
- Removal of Banner ad so that it doesn't overlap in the gameplay

We love hearing from you! Please keep your feedback coming and rate us on the Appstore if you like the game!

v4.2
- Fixed bug which deducted coins after being awarded a plane in Daily Rewards
- Improved edge-to-edge full screen support for iPad Pro
- Simplified certain levels of Career mode which needed high no. of Missiles to be destroyed by Flares

Get ready for a BIG update!

v1.9:
- New Backgrounds added! With each new plane you get a new environment completely Free! No extra purchases required. Now don't get bored seeing the same scenery throughout the game
- Sound on/off setting is saved

Thank you for making the game a success! We look forward to adding new features & planes in next updates. Please send us your feedback and ideas to info@spiel-s.com.

And, most importantly, if you liked the game, please give us 5 stars on the Appstore! We love to hear from you :)

Thank you for all the feedback!

- 2 New Planes

Thank you for all the feedback! 

v1.2:
- 2 New Planes

---- x ---- x ----

v1.1:
- Now get Free coins on watching videos! 
- Ads get disabled if you buy No-Ads
- Unlock Flares at Level 8 instead of Level 10

Thank you for all the feedback! 

v1.3:
- Apart from purchasing items from inside the game, you can now also buy In-App Purchases eg. No Ads, Coin Packs, etc. directly from the Appstore (We now support Promoted IAPs). It will first ask you to download the game (if you have not already), and then automatically open the game for you and begin the purchase! But when you do, make sure you are on v1.3 and above!

Roadmap for future updates:
- New Environments
- New Planes
- iCloud game saves

---- x ---- x ----

v1.2:
- 2 New Planes

We have made some changes based on your feedback! Please keep it coming!

v1.6:
- The Shield will flash for a second before it deactivates (This was one of the highest feature request!)
- We have increased the minimum and maximum time limit for Shield and Speed Boost! (It will remain active for a longer period)
- We have delayed the activation time of the Red Missile across all levels! 
- Now you'll also be able to see the indicator of the second missile even if you are already engaged with the first one!
- Fixed bug related to lag when you play with No or Limited Internet connectivity

Now go ahead and beat your previous high score!

Please send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com and rate us on the Appstore!

We have made some changes based on your feedback! Please keep it coming!

v1.6:
- The Shield will flash for a second before it deactivates (This was one of the highest feature request!)
- We have increased the minimum and maximum time limit for Shield and Speed Boost! (It will remain active for a longer period)
- We have delayed the activation time of the Red Missile across all levels! 
- Now you'll also be able to see the indicator of the second missile even if you are already engaged with the first one!
- Fixed bug related to lag when you play with No or Limited Internet connectivity

Now go ahead and beat your previous high score!

Please send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com and rate us on the Appstore!

Please keep the feedback coming! We would love to get your ideas and put them in the game!

v1.7:
- Fixed bug related to two same power-ups being picked up consecutively while the first is still active.  
- You get more points for destroying different types of Missiles via Shield/Flares (Highly requested feature by users!)
a. +5 Score for destroying Black Missile
b. +10 Score for destroying the Blue Missile
c. +20 Score for destroying the RED Missile!
d. Also +20 Score (instead of +10) for colliding any missiles into each other!
- Added Home & Shop buttons on the Objectives screen for easier navigation and to enable users to go buy Flares if forgotten earlier (Based on several user feedback)
- UI optimisation for iPhone X
- Added App Preview on Appstore for iPhone X
- Get 15 Free Coins instead of 10 for watching videos!

Happy Flying!

Please send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com and rate us 5 stars on the Appstore if you like the game!

Please keep the feedback coming! We would love to get your ideas and put them in the game!

- Get 15 Free Coins instead of 10 for watching videos!

Happy Flying!

Please send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com and rate us 5 stars on the Appstore if you like the game!

Some quick fixes:

v1.8:
- Flares button has been re-designed with a little translucent layer so that indicator arrows which overlap with the button are now visible (Highly requested feature by users)
- Fix regarding Speed Boost Power-up

Please send us your feedback and ideas to info@spiel-s.com

v1.95 (A quickie update):
- If you resume the game after pressing the home button in the gameplay or get a call during the game, the game starts at the Pause menu, and does not begin automatically. Some of our players wanted a breathing space before the game actually started :)
- Optimised file size

Thank you for all the love and let your feedback keep pouring in at info@spiel-s.com. We will soon have a major update with new planes! 

If you like the game, please rate it 5 stars and leave a review! (We read each one of them!)

v1.95 (A quickie update):
- If you resume the game after pressing the home button in the gameplay or get a call during the game, the game starts at the Pause menu, and does not begin automatically. Some of our players wanted a breathing space before the game actually started :)
- Optimised file size

Thank you for all the love and let your feedback keep pouring in at info@spiel-s.com. We will soon have a major update with new planes! 

If you like the game, please rate it 5 stars and leave a review! (We read each one of them!)

v1.96:
We just squashed some minor bugs!
Keep Flying!

PS. We have some new exciting updates in the pipeline, coming SOOON!

v1.96:
We just squashed some minor bugs!
Keep Flying!

PS. We have some new exciting updates in the pipeline, coming SOOON!

v1.98:
- Language support for our Japanese, Korean, Russian and Chinese players!
- Minor bug fixes

Please send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com and leave a review if you like the game! We read each one of them! 

Also, a BIG UPDATE is coming SOON!

Thank-you!

v1.98:
- Language support for our Japanese, Korean, Russian and Chinese players!
- Minor bug fixes

Please send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com and leave a review if you like the game! We read each one of them! 

Also, a BIG UPDATE is coming SOON!

Thank-you!

Get ready for a MAJOR Update! Thank you to all our players for the love and feedback that you have given us!

v2.0:
- 10 New Challenging Levels
- 2 New types of Missiles which will follow you and try to bring you down
- 2 New Planes available in the Shop to buy
- Introducing Ammo Power-up which allows you to fire bullets and shoot down incoming missiles!
- Also, introducing Shock-Wave Power-up which instantly destroys all missiles in your radius range!
- 3 Extra Lives which you can use if you crash your plane!

Apart from the above, we have also added multiple missile indicators (red arrows) when more than 1 missile is following you!

If you liked the game before, you will love it now! 

We look forward to hearing from you and if you enjoy the game, please help us by rating it on the Appstore! We read each and every review. Please feel free to contact us on info@spiel-s.com.

Get ready for a MAJOR Update! Thank you to all our players for the love and feedback that you have given us!

We look forward to hearing from you and if you enjoy the game, please help us by rating it on the Appstore! We read each and every review. Please feel free to contact us on info@spiel-s.com.

We are preparing a major update for next month where we have some cool things lined up!

Meanwhile, we have added a New Plane (Jetliner) which gets unlocked at level 2! Try this out while we work on the next update which will really spice things up!

If you would like a preview or help us with some play testing, drop us a mail at info@spiel-s.com.

Thank you!

We are preparing a major update for next month where we have some cool things lined up!

Meanwhile, we have added a New Plane (Jetliner) which gets unlocked at level 2! Try this out while we work on the next update which will really spice things up!

If you would like a preview or help us with some play testing, drop us a mail at info@spiel-s.com.

Thank you!

Introducing 2 New Games Modes:
- Survival Mode (A Fast-Paced Challenging Action mode)
- Time Attack (Score as much as you can in 60 seconds!)

Other Updates:
- 3 New Planes
- 1 New Power-Up (Auto Flares)
- New Right/Left Control options
- Multi-Touch support so that you don't need to lift your finger to deploy Flares (Requested by so so so many players!)

We are sure you will LOVE this new Major Update with lots and lots of improvements based on all your feedback!

Please keep them coming, and thank you to all our beta testers who joined our program!

Please leave a review on the Appstore if you like the game, and you can contact us at info@spiel-s.com.

Thank you for your love and support for Man Vs. Missiles! We are super happy that you are enjoying the game, and we strive to improve and make it better every single day!

- Added 10 New Levels (Total 50 Levels to play in Career Mode!)
- Added 2 New Planes (Military Helicopter and a Space Shuttle)
- Minor improvements in Main Menu UI
- Improved localisations for Chinese and Russian languages

Also play the new challenging Survival & Time Attack modes which were introduced in the previous update! We look forward to hearing from you. Please rate & review the game - we read each and every one of 'em!

Feel free to write to us at info@spiel-s.com,

Thank you!

Thank you for enjoying Man Vs. Missiles! With each update we are pushing the envelope and trying to give you more. This is one update which all of you will love!

- Introducing Special New Plane to celebrate FOURTH OF JULY! Use this plane for FREE for the first 24 hours!
- TRY A NEW PLANE, EVERYDAY! Yes, you will be able to experience all the planes in the shop for FREE for 10 Minutes!
- Option to Auto Level-Up once you complete all objectives in a level
- Improved in-game UI to keep check on total objectives
- With purchase of any coins pack, we are also removing ads!

Hope you like this new update! Please feel free to drop us your feedback at info@spiel-s.com, and leave a review on the Appstore.

v3.0:
- Introducing Auto-renewable Subscription, called VIP Access that unlocks & buys all available Planes in the game, and also gives you access to a new set of VIP Planes which are fast and have special abilities! 
- 5 Exclusive VIP Planes
- 7 Days Free Trial for VIP Access with Weekly Subscription
- Increased the speed of Discovery Shuttle & a few other planes

Thank you for enjoying Man Vs. Missiles, and we look forward to hearing from you!

v3.1 (Build 53):
- Introducing Auto-renewable Subscription, called VIP Access with 7-Day Free Trial, that unlocks & buys all available Planes in the game, and also gives you access to a new set of VIP Planes which are fast and have special abilities! 
- 5 Exclusive VIP Planes
- 7 Days Free Trial for VIP Access with Weekly Subscription
- Increased the speed of Discovery Shuttle & a few other planes

For existing players: 
Your old purchases are not affected by Subscription, and you can continue playing the game as is. If you buy the subscription you will avail all benefits, and your old purchases will remain intact if you choose to cancel the subscription later.

PS. Subscription is not mandatory to enjoy or complete the game! You can use it if you like the game and wish to unlock all the planes instantly!

Thank you for enjoying Man Vs. Missiles, and we look forward to hearing from you!

Thank you for enjoying Man Vs. Missiles! We have increased the bar yet further, and are now introducing Multiplayer! 
- Play online against real players and try to score higher than them!
- Get instantly matched and view each other's score real time. 
- 500 Daily Bonus Coins if you subscribe to VIP Access

We look forward to seeing you Online, and feel free to send us your feedback to info@spiel-s.com

Thank you for the overwhelming response to our Multiplayer version! We have had close to 200,000 unique multiplayer sessions in the last 45 days since we launched with instant matching and no complaints of lag.

We have made major improvements since then:
- Now compete against 4 other opponents real time (1-vs-4)
- Added Objectives Overlay in gameplay screen when playing Career mode
- Introducing Daily Rewards for playing Man vs. Missiles daily!

Please keep the feedback coming to info@spiel-s.com. We love to hear what you think and how we can improve the game further! Also, please rate & review the game on the Appstore, we read each and every of them!

Thank you to all our players in the last 1 year who have played and enjoyed Man Vs. Missiles! 

a. In this new update we are thrilled to introduce a new game mode - TOURNAMENTS. Post your high score online and compete in global and country rankings to win free coins!

b. Also check out the New Rocket Plane with Fireworks which we are releasing in this new update, available in VIP Planes.

c. Other minor improvements and bug fixes

Please do keep your feedback coming. We read and reply to each one of them!

v4.2
- Fixed bug which deducted coins after being awarded a plane in Daily Rewards
- Improved edge-to-edge full screen support for iPad Pro
- Simplified certain levels of Career mode which needed high no. of Missiles to be destroyed by Flares

v4.2
- Fixed bug which deducted coins after being awarded a plane in Daily Rewards
- Improved edge-to-edge full screen support for iPad Pro
- Simplified certain levels of Career mode which needed high no. of Missiles to be destroyed by Flares

v4.5 (Major Update):
- Introducing new game mode - DUELS. Now play head-to-head realtime with an online opponent using any random Plane in the game!
- 5 New Planes added specifically themed for - USA, China, India, Japan & Russian players
- 1 New VIP Plane added
- Improved localization for Japanese & Korean languages

We love hearing from you! Please keep your feedback coming and rate us on the Appstore if you like the game!

As promised, this is a major update with new features, new planes, more levels and a brand new Dark Mode design! 

- 5 New Faster Planes 
- 10 Additional Levels
- New Purple Missile unlocked at higher levels
- New Help & Support feature to chat with our team from within the app!
- Full support & compatibility for iOS 13
- Several minor bug fixes

Try out the new beautiful Dark Mode design - You will love it!

We look forward to your feedback, please write to us at info@spiel-s.com or drop in your review on the Appstore! We love to hear from you!

Man Vs. Missiles is celebrating it's 3rd Birthday! We have a round of new updates and features for all our players:

- Introducing 'Happy Hours' which helps you get 2x coins during 30 mins of activation
- Free 1000 Bonus Coins to get you started
- 3 New Planes
- Improved UI & New Icon
- Special Offer on Coins Pack & VIP Subscription!

Special 4th of July update for all our players from USA. Happy Independence Day!
- You can now buy a pack of 5 Flares within the game! These are temporary Flares which can be used only during that game, and does not carry forward.
- Free 1000 Coins
- Special USA theme Plane
- 10 more levels added. Play a total of 100 Levels!!

Happy Flying.
